text: Ara tara yakhana muminadera sathe saksata kare takhana bale, ‘amara imana enechi’. Abara yakhana tara gopane eke an'yera sathe milita haya takhana bale, tomara ki taderake ta bale da'o, ya allah‌ tomadera kache unmukta kare diyechena [1]; yate tara era madhyame tomadera rabera nikata tomadera birud'dhe dalila pesa karabe? Tabe tomara ki bujha na [2]?’
